pullRequest.title: [BEAM-9821] Populate all SpannerIO batching parameters in display data.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Not all of the batching/grouping parameters are added in populateDisplayData() for SpannerIO.Write, and there is no populateDisplayData in SpannerIO.WriteGrouped.
This PR adds all the grouping/batching parameters to both
SpannerIO.Write.populateDisplayData()
SpannerIO.WriteGrouped.populateDisplayData()

nodes.bodyText:
I added some commits to tweak these descriptions a bit. @nielm can you confirm that they're still correct?
Also I wonder if you can re-use the implementation in Write by calling spec.populateDisplayData(builder) here instead?
